results.name: Air Fryer Sâ€™mores
results.description: The secret to getting the most ooey, gooey marshmallows for your sâ€™mores? An air fryer, of course!

results.name: How To Make Classic Croissants At Home
results.description: There is really nothing better than a freshly baked croissant. The art of laminating dough takes practice and patience, but once you perfect it, the reward is insanely sweet. This recipe is truly a labor of love that makes perfectly flaky and pillowy pastries every time.

results.name: Copycat Costco Chicken Bake
results.description: Skip the trip to Costco and make these chicken bakes at home in a flash! With just a few simple ingredients, you can make this classic food court item in under an hourâ€“no membership required.

results.name: Bone Broth Ramen
results.description: Bone Broth Ramen is the perfect lazy meal for one! Curl up on the couch with a warm bowl of this protein packed recipe. Add leftover or frozen veggies to your pan to mix it up. Make sure to throw in any leftover protein you have in the fridge like chicken, tofu or bacon!

results.name: Hummus Caesar Salad
results.description: Vegan caesar has never been easier thanks to this time saving hack! Using hummus as the base of the dressing gives you richness while being both nut and dairy free. Adjust the consistency to your liking by adding more hummus for a thicker dressing or more water for thinner. This dressing is packed with flavor thanks to brininess from the capers, cheesiness from the nutritional yeast, and umami from the miso.

results.name: Grilled Brown Sugar Bourbon Salmon Salad
Falafel Waffle
results.description: This recipe is a perfect Mediterranean appetizer, vegetarian snack or savory breakfast! Fill your Falafel Waffle with your favorite toppings like hummus, tahini, feta, vegetables or meat. Try making your own Falafel Waffle Sandwich for breakfast, lunch or dinner. This easy snack is definitely a must try.

results.name: Cinnamon Toast Crunch Baked Oats
results.description: Cinnamon Toast Crunch Baked Oats is a perfect breakfast or dessert! This recipe is filled with energy, protein and a little extra sweetness. The Crunchy Cinnamon Toast cereal top compliments the molten peanut butter center. Try this in your oven or an air fryer for convenience.

results.name: Bacon Butter
results.description: At Tasty, weâ€™re always trying to make the world a â€œbutterâ€? place. This quick and easy recipe is a great way to use up leftover bacon fat. Spread this butter over your next biscuit, grilled cheese, or steak!

results.name: Luca-Inspired Trenette Al Pesto
results.description: We made the popular pesto pasta from Pixarâ€™s Luca and it was an instant hit! This dish comes together super quickly and is a great meal to add to your weeknight rotation!

results.name: Encanto-Inspired Arepas Con Queso With Avocado Mash
results.description: We made the popular arepas con queso from Disneyâ€™s Encanto. One bite and we felt like we were transported to the magical home of Maribel. Make sure to use pre-cooked cornmeal, as regular cornmeal will not work in this recipe.

results.name: Snacks for March Madness
results.description: March is here and that means so is a season of magnificent basketball! Itâ€™s time to get your brackets straight and cheer your heart out for your time. From Cheesy Chicken Nuggets to Fish & Chips, we are making sure that you get the perfect fuel for this action-packed season. Turn the game on, sit back on your couch and get yourself one of our tasty snacks!

results.name: Spill The Tea
results.description: Tea has been part of our life for thousands of years and yet there's so much variety to it! Whether youâ€™re having a relaxing afternoon, or reading a book, or gossiping about your new neighbors, or having a fancy tea party, these recipes are here to serve! Get the kettle out, 'cause it's time to spill the tea...not literally of course.

results.name: How To Make The Best Baked Mac And Cheese
results.description: Nothing says comfort like a homemade baked mac and cheese. Our favorite version is made with a luscious and creamy sauce that pools in the pasta shells for the ultimate cheesy feel-good food.

results.name: Citrus Espresso Custard Toast
results.description: Citrus and coffee are shockingly a match made in heaven. Try this fun twist on the viral custard toast trend featuring a buttery croissant filled with espresso-flavored custard and topped with juicy caramelized grapefruit!

results.name: 6 Mexican Recipes To Make Tonight!
results.description: Say Ciao to your boring food and Hola to some of the finest Mexican Recipes we have for you here! Start off your meal with these Loaded Chicken Fajita Nachos. Then move on to some Spicy Beef And Pork Empanadas. And nothing screams Mexican than some good old Cauliflower Walnut Burrito. Who's ready for a Mexican Feast?

results.name: 9 Donut Recipes To Satisfy Cravings
results.description: Craving something sweet? Do-nut worry because we have something special for you! You can make these amazingly easy and delicious donuts from the comfort of your own kitchen. From Ice Cream Donut Holes to these gorgeous Cinnamon Syrup-Glazed Doughnuts, your friends will surely be in awe of your cooking skills!

results.name: Jamaican Beef Patties With Coco Bread
results.description: These Jamaican-inspired curry-spiced turnovers are filled with a savory ground beef mixture and wrapped in a flaky dough. Theyâ€™re served up with a side of coco breadâ€“a slightly sweetened bread made with coconut milk and coconut oil. Pro tip: try wrapping the beef patties in the coco bread for a delicious sweet and savory pairing!

results.name: Smoked Chicken Sausage And Rice Bowl
Sweet Food For Your Sweet Tooth!
results.description: Fact: Having a sweet tooth is a 100% real. And if you are one of them, then boy do we have something special for you! From some quick & easy. Cookies 'n' Cream Truffles to this fancy French Style Lemon Tart , WE HAVE IT ALL! So enjoy some of the best sweet food you just cant say no to! And remember.. There's always room for some dessert.

results.name: Epic Party Snacks
results.description: Planning to throw a house party to impress your friends? Look no further! These quick & easy Pizza Puff Pastry Twists would make for a great party snack! And if you want to take it up a notch, then we recommend some indulgent Ham And Cheese Pull Apart Garlic Bread. And finally, wrap up your party with this drool-worthy Chocolate Fondue Banana Bread Boat! Cheers to an Epic Party!

results.name: Everything Bagel And Salmon Fresh Spring Rolls
Crispy Pork Chop With Honey Mustard
Aesthetically Pleasing Recipes
results.description: Want your food to look as pretty and Aesthetic as your Instagram feed? We've got you covered! Bedazzle your followers with these pretty and just as tasty recipes that are really easy to make. Add 'sage' to your profile with Dairy-Free Coconut Matcha Panna Cotta or maybe some muted color with a Fall Ratatouille. And if you really want to tempt your audience then check out these gorgeous Sugar Swirl Cookies! Time to pull out the camera!

results.name: The Best Birthday Cake
results.description: We spent many weeks in the Tasty kitchen perfecting this birthday cake recipe. We tested every hack, every possible preparation method, and left no cake layer unfrosted. The result was a tender, moist, and vanilla-forward cake packed with unlimited sprinkles and a light and creamy buttercream.

results.name: Slow Cooker White Cheddar And Spinach Quiche
Surf And Turf Tacos (Tacos Mar Y Tierra)
Spicy Rice Noodles With Ground Pork And Scallions
results.description: Whatâ€™s more comforting than a bowl of noodles with spicy and savory ground pork? With fragrant, flavorful sesame oil, scallions, and chile-garlic paste, this dish is a treat for all of the senses.

results.name: Hot & Spicy Recipes
results.description: To all the spice lovers out there, here's the ultimate spice challenge! We've got some dangerously spicy dishes hand-picked just for you! Kickstart your day with some Spicy Korean BBQ-style Pork. For lunch, we recommend these Chili Lime Steak Tacos! For a quick mid-day snack, roast up some Spicy Chickpeas. And finally, for dinner let's take it up a notch with this Spicy Southern Hot Corn. Let the challenge begin!

results.name: Recipes To Share With Your Burger Buddy
results.description: To all the burger lovers out there, look no further! We have the most juicy and indulgent burger recipes you can share with your burger buddy! If you prefer keeping things simple, then check out our classic Homemade Massive Burger. And if you think you can take up a good challenge, then this Mac N Cheese Bun Burger will BLOW YOUR MIND. Say YES to this Burgermania to which even Inspector Clouseau was not immune!
